wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Stuart Richard Skeates,  (born 1966) is a British Army officer. He served as Deputy Commander of JFC Brunssum from December 2018 to December 2021. He also previously served as Standing Joint Force Commander from 2015 to 2018.
